assumptions: white_plate is on table within reachable workspace
perception can locate plate via raster scan
coherence_with_global: Implements perception (visibility check with raster scan fallback), MoveAbove, OpenGripper, ComputeGraspPose (side), ApproachAndAlign, Pick, and verification (ObjectInGripper) in the same order and semantics as GLOBAL_BT and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION.
